name: Contenders: Bionic Control
description:
Your clan has been attacked by robotic animals during the early years of your life. Now that you are older you have become stronger. Take revenge for your clan and the world as you are one of the only living creatures left alive in this world. This is your chance you either take it or leave it. Shoot the enemies and win the game...show them who's the real winner here.

See RAR file for references for music.

Issue with the rigid body of projectiles add force to player.
